template.description: Examples of XML to XML transformation, XML to SOAP and JSON to JSON.
template.name: Transformation Example

labels.label: In this flow we will get XML and use XSLT to transform it into a format that is valid input to SAP connector.
This flow will transform JSON using JOLT. It has been used in a POC where we received the original JSON from Salesforce and needed to convert it into a format that Dispatch API understood.
In this use case, we receive XML, convert to SOAP and make a call to SAP PI. We then convert the response back to XML and respond to the client.

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute
